header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

exec: // Test to set the bearer variable with the response from logging in with username 'admin' and password 'admin123'
pm.test("Set the bearer variable with the response from logging in", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include('eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9'); // Check if the response includes the JWT token
pm.environment.set("bearerToken", pm.response.text()); // Set the bearer variable with the JWT token
